name: Mouse House (itch)
description:
Hello everyone!

Before I start rambling about the game, I just have to say that I had a great time making this game with my brother on Ludum Dare 37. We made it in 2 days and I think it's the best game we've ever made.

Now I'll tell you a little bit about the game. In Mouse House, you play as a mouse that is trying to get from one side of the room to the other while it's being chased by a cat.

It sounds simple, but you will have a fun time playing it :)

- MacDocBros
